plot outline: Daughter of slum dwellers, Kajal is a poor girl with immense will to learn. After being adopted by a childless couple, Kajal's life changes irreversibly. From streets to a happy family, Kajal is brought up in comforts of a lavish house. Well educated Kajal becomes a doctor when she is visited by her sick alcoholic father, from whom she was adopted. In the efforts of repaying the sacrifices of her father for providing her with a warm house and all the well being, Kajal learns the ultimate truth of her life. In the process of Kidney donation, when her DNA doesn't match with her father's, Kajal is desperate to know - "Who I am?!"
title: Green Signal
plot: Abandoned. Sold. Sheltered. This is the story of a girl whose life took different turns, changing everything beyond imagination. A dreading question awaits her - "Who am I?!"

Daughter of slum dwellers, Kajal is a poor girl with immense will to learn. After being adopted by a childless couple, Kajal's life changes irreversibly. From streets to a happy family, Kajal is brought up in comforts of a lavish house. Well educated Kajal becomes a doctor when she is visited by her sick alcoholic father, from whom she was adopted. In the efforts of repaying the sacrifices of her father for providing her with a warm house and all the well being, Kajal learns the ultimate truth of her life. In the process of Kidney donation, when her DNA doesn't match with her father's, Kajal is desperate to know - "Who I am?!"::sharadsingh thakur
